Name: Snapshot
About the game: Based on a short story of the same name. This free short kinetic visual novel was developed for Magical Girl Game Jam 3. The heiress of an ancient magical family uses a special camera to uncover the past — both of history, and of herself. Scope Kinetic novel — no routes coming of age, philosophical, science fantasy ~7500 words Seven depicted characters — bust-up sprites, full voiceover Cast Kelly Greenshield Narrator / Defunct Magician James Halliday Cambridge Student / British Hipster Spencer Hiroshi Field Man / Young Dad bunnyhoodie Woman / Young Mom Jenna Long Boy and Girl / Small Kids Josh Portillo Escort / Balding Scientist Team Madeleine Chai Producer & Project Manager Tim Min Director & Writer Justin Hsu Artistic Consultant & Background Artist Eric Li Technical Consultant & Supplemental Artist LoiLoi Sprite Artist & Character Designer MadScientist GUI Designer & GUI Programmer Music Special thanks to Kevin MacLeod . Engine Made with Ren'Py .
